original_title: 汗ばむ美乳妻 夫に背いた昼下がり
overview: Kaoru, a housewife of'smell fetish ', is excited by her body odor. She was married, and on the day of the marriage, she sniffed her husband's sweaty handkerchief and got married. However, in a house that is always tidy and clean, she never smelled it again ... And every day she immerses herself in masturbation with her collection (clothes that smell sweaty) that her husband has hidden. In such a life, after the treatment, the toilet tissue is clogged and the business is called. The man who came in was working hard while sweating, but looking at it, she was disturbed by her instinct.
title: Asebamu binyû tsuma otto ni somuita hirusagari
